annotation.spannedText: Everybody get vaccinated!

annotation.spannedText: conventional media and health authorities

annotation.spannedText: The vaccine industry (along with the mainstream media) dishonestly positions vaccines as offering 100% protection with 0% risk

annotation.spannedText: That's a lie

annotation.spannedText: The most important thing you can do when considering any vaccine is READ THE VACCINE INSERT!

annotation.spannedText: You'd be astonished to learn what's printed on the vaccine insert because it's totally different from what the media tells you about vaccines

annotation.spannedText: Never allow your children to be injected with a vaccine without requesting the vaccine insert which must be provided to patients by law

annotation.spannedText: If anybody in the media ever uttered this, they would be immediately labeled an "anti-vaxxer!

annotation.spannedText: you can't hand out the same tear-away sheet to 10 people, which is part of the reason why nearly everyone who gets a vaccine never sees the vaccine insert in advance

annotation.spannedText: vaccine pushers hope you never read the insert because they want to keep you in the dark about the side effects and toxic ingredients used in vaccines

annotation.spannedText: They also want you to be completely unaware that many vaccines can actually spread the disease they claim to prevent

classMention.mentionClass: They also want you to be completely unaware that many vaccines can actually spread the disease they claim to prevent

annotation.spannedText: Many measles outbreaks, it turns out, occur largely among children who were vaccinated against measles

annotation.spannedText: These are the truths about vaccines they don't want you to know

annotation.spannedText: Rather than have the public be informed, they prefer to slap you in the face with twisted claims of "SCIENCE!" combined with the condemnation, intimidation and censorship of anyone who actually tries to point out what the vaccine insert says in black and white
